Questions.Answer:
Point form outline

Main idea:New technology makes homes safer

But:Media reports suggest opposite: that these gadgets are volatile

Because:Competition for viewers makes news prioritize sensational stories

  • Public mistakenly assumes these stories are the rule, rather than the exception

Actually:Data shows smart tech makes homes safe, don’t cause accidents

  • Source: Conniff, Time, 2014, para.3

Three main kinds of smart home tech:

  1. Security systems
  2. Fire and carbon monoxide detectors
  3. Lighting systems
